text: The Texaco Cup was an association football competition in England. == Winners == Finals played over two legs except 1973-74, aggregate score given. Season Winners Runners-up Aggregate score 1970–71 Wolverhampton Wanderers Heart of Midlothian 3-2 1971–72 Derby County Airdrieonians 2-1 1972–73 Ipswich Town Norwich City 4-2 1973–74 Newcastle United Burnley 2-1 1974–75 Newcastle United Southampton 3-1 Category:Football competitions in the United Kingdom
title: Texaco Cup
